Class Party

java.lang.Object
  Party

public class Party
extends java.lang.Object

This class holds objects of type Monster or PlayerCharacter depending on the constructor used for loading into combat or as an object for the players to store their party

Version:
(0.1_5)
Author:
(DeusBlu)
